content.rendered:
Directed by Jon Huertas. Anna Mastro. Kevin Mock. David Straiton. Ben Younger.

Written by Julia Cohen. Julia Cohen. Jung-hoon Han. Emily Cheever. David H. Miller. J.D. Shields. Morgan Faust. Phil Klemmer. Johnny Richardson.

Cast Catherine Haena Kim (Emma Hill). Sarah Wayne Callies (Birdie Nicoletti). Polly Draper (Fran Nicoletti). Tim Chiou (David Hill). James Saito (Joseph Hill). Freda Foh Shen (Grace Hill). Felisha Terrell (Daphne Finch). William Fichtner (Leo Nicoletti). Shaylee Mansfield (Ollie Nicoletti). Courtney Taylor (Emma’s Assistant). Efka Kvaraciejus (Seamus).

Language English.

Producers Julia Cohen. Phil Klemmer. Jon M. Chu. Russ Cundiff. Caitlin Foito. Lindsay Goffman. Mike Gray. Deanna Harris. Todd Harthan. Milo Ventimiglia. Han-Sang Jo. Kim min/Ep-Tae. Jae-Hyeok Yoon. Tim Barker. Lana Cho. Morgan Faust. Adam Lash.

Production Electric Somewhere Co.. Divide Pictures. Gratitude Productions.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 7

Status OnGoing (2023–)
